description: This file defines a performance evaluation setup for a tool-based agent that provides weather information using the smolagents library. It includes class definitions for a WeatherTool, a function to instantiate the agent, and runs a performance evaluation.

classes.name: WeatherTool
classes.description: A tool class that provides weather information based on city input.

methods.name: instantiate_agent
methods.description: Creates and returns a ToolCallingAgent with the WeatherTool and a specified model.
